news.title: Speculation Simon Harris to take Finance Minister job as Paschal Donohoe resigns for role with World Bank
Judge orders ‘grotesque’ Enoch Burke be sent to prison for fourth time
news.summary: A judge has ruled that anti-transgender schoolteacher Enoch Burke should be sent to prison for a fourth time for contempt of court orders requiring him to stay away from Wilson’s Hospital School in Westmeath.

news.title: Woman (50s) dies and husband in ICU after stabbing outside Cork home, man (20s) arrested
news.summary: A woman (50s) has died and her husband (60s) is in a critical condition after they were both stabbed outside their Cork home.

news.title: Blackrock Clinic co-founder and wife file for bankruptcy with debts of €14.5m
news.summary: A co-founder of the Blackrock Clinic private hospital and his wife have filed for bankruptcy, listing debts of around €14.5m.

news.title: A teacher, a student, a farmer, a plumber and a salesman: The five young crash victims whose lives were cut short in one tragic night
news.summary: The five young friends killed in the Louth road tragedy were embarking on a variety of paths in their lives.

news.title: Lucinda O’Sullivan’s restaurant review: A buzzing atmosphere, exceptional staff and fine seafood at this expanded Dublin city centre spot
news.summary: “I really like the notion of being in high-end restaurants and trying their cheaper options.” So said a languidly elegant female to a man who seemed like her blind date, reeling off the names of a few notables in London, Paris and New York.

news.title: ‘It’s worth over €300,000 if you receive the full state pension and live to the age of 85’ – meet the Irish people who cashed in on the UK state pension windfall
news.summary: Like generations of Irish workers before him, Seamus Doyle found himself working in the sprawling Ford Motor Company plant in Dagenham in the 1980s. He’d been recruited by an Irishman as an industrial painter, and painted the roofs, floors and offices of what was then Europe’s biggest car factory.

news.title: Daniel McDonnell: With Budapest boys hailing from nine counties, Ireland squad truly represents the nation
news.summary: Talk about striking the right tone. Heimir Hallgrimsson’s delivery of his thoughts after the memorable mayhem in the Puskas Arena hit on so many points that it made sense when he admitted that he had prepared them beforehand in case of victory.

news.title: ‘Nearly a full football team’ – mother ‘over the moon’ after giving birth to triplets – just two years after twin boys
news.summary: A mother has joked that her family now “nearly has a full football team” after giving birth to triplets – having already welcomed a pair of twins two years ago.

news.title: Kirsty Blake Knox: Why Adam Peaty and Holly Ramsay’s wedding drama is the latest celebrity family feud we can't get enough of
news.summary: Ordinarily, details of the upcoming wedding of a gold medal Olympian swimmer and a popular influencer, whose dad is a mega-celebrity chef, would have filled social columns.
